name: Sonic The Hedgehog 2: Sat AM Edition
overview: Simple project to style Sonic 2 more like the Sonic the Hedgehog (A.K.A Sonic Sat AM) cartoon. Just graphical changes, including new sprites for Sonic, darker fur color for Tails, now he is brown, instead of orange, Western design for Doctor Robotnik, creepier and less colorful design for many badniks, to make them look more like soulless machines, just like in the show.
